originalText.text: Super impressed with the efficiency and quality of the products I ordered! The rose mist/glow toner is light and easy on my skin and gives me a very dewy glow. The rose oil is absolutely amazing-smells divine and is ultra hydrating, without clogging my pores. The attentive care I received from Yoav was beyond perfection; I couldnâ€™t be happier with their service! I highly recommend and will definitely be ordering from Sweetwater Labs again!

originalText.text:
I love the under eye oil. It is rich and a tiny amount goes a very long way. It is absorbed but also provides just enough moisture to make those stubborn wrinkles become less and less. It has significantly decreased mine for sure!
Thank you for creating healthy effective treasures such as these!!ðŸ’•

originalText.text:
I usually never write reviews, but Sweetwaterlab really deserves every praise!
I'm so happy I came across it, quite by a chance, while visiting NYC.
I purchased their rose oil because I was hooked by its smell- and that alone was worth it.
But once I started using it- wow!
I was ecstatic with the amazing results!
Definitely recommend it to anyone, especially those who love pure, natural effective products!

originalText.text:
Great products but they take forever to ship. I ordered from 1/30 and no notice of shipping yet. I have already been charged even without shipping email yet. Itâ€™s now 2/10.

Edit: I usually do not come back to change a review but the comment from the owner below was truthful. It arrived the next day. The service recovery was personable and was very thoughtful. Their products are pretty amazing. One thing Iâ€™d suggest is using a different packaging for refills because I have so many glass jars (from all the products) I need to toss which is sad but if they could opt for refill packets for their bestsellers. I found a product that it great for me. I also wish they would have a sunblock I can apply after I put rose oil on my face. I can speak more for other suggestions. Giving them 5 stars this time. Logistics can be revised, but itâ€™s rare to have an all-natural product that actually works.

originalText.text: I discovered Sweetwater Labs while vacationing in New York City several months ago. Iâ€™ve tried many of their products and have nothing but good things to say! Some of my favorites are the Vitamin Face Serum, Papaya Face Glow, the Jasmine and Sandalwood Perfumes, and the Candles! Sweetwater Labs also has amazing customer service. They are available via phone, email, and chat to answer questions, make suggestions, or assist with requests. Iâ€™ve always had a pleasant experience which has made purchasing easy and more enjoyable!
